snippet: A public outcry ensued when graphic photos of a 23-year-old woman and her dead fetus were posted online.
abstract: China suspends three local family planning officials in northwest China following public outcry over reports that they had forced 23-year-old Feng Jianmei to undergo an abortion seven months into her pregnancy; story received widespread attention online after the woman's husband posted graphic photos of her lying in a hospital bed with the remains of the fetus.
lead_paragraph: A public outcry ensued when graphic photos of a 23-year-old woman and her dead fetus were posted online.

headline.seo: China Suspends Family Planning Workers After Forced Abortion
headline.main: China Suspends Family Planning Workers After Forced Abortion
headline.print_headline: China Suspends Family Planning Workers After Forced Abortion
